column1: * 1916 – J.R.R. Tolkien marries Edith Tolkien in the church of St Mary Immaculate in Kortirion.
* 1968 - The Daily Telegraph publishes The Man Who Understands Hobbits of Charlotte and Denis Plimmer with J.R.R. Tolkien.
* 1981 - The third episode of the The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series) of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC.
* 1996 - Tyalië Tyelelliéva issue Tyalië Tyelelliéva 8 is published.
* 2006 - Preview performances of The Lord of the Rings Musical end.
* 2018 - Pagan Saints in Middle-earth is published.
** Borondir is on his way in search of the Éothéod.
** Frodo Baggins and Samwise Gamgee leave the road and turn south to Mount Doom.
** Third attack on Lothlórien.Category:Datesde:22. Märzfi:22. maaliskuuta
